_sText:
It's the 3rd version of this map. There are many changes : 
- All of exterior is new 
- There is an attic in house 
- HDR support 
- new environment sounds 
- possibility to turn off power of house 
- there is a camera network and a PC for view 
- many bugfix, improvements, optimizations, ... 

All models, materials and sound are in the BSP. Only the NAV file is separate.
